tionAccessToken":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"expirationRefreshToken":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}}},"UserDto":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"fullName":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string"},"permissions":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"enabled":{"type":"boolean"},"accountNonExpired":{"type":"boolean"},"accountNonLocked":{"type":"boolean"},"credentialsNonExpired":{"type":"boolean"}}},"CredentialsDto":{"required":["email","password"],"type":"object","properties":{"email":{"type":"string"},"password":{"type":"string"}}},"UserRegisterDto":{"required":["email","fullName","password"],"type":"object","properties":{"fullName":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string"},"password":{"type":"string"}}}}}}
